website_summaries.verdict: The Puma Classic Nylon R13 is a classic sporty shoe that features a design that transcends trends and hype. Equipped with its well-loved silhouette and materials, this shoe provides a recognizable fit and time-tested comfort as its predecessor.This kick possesses all the necessary features of a classic everyday shoe: time-honored design, superb comfort, durability, and affordable price, which could be great reasons for a possible purchase.
pros: An overwhelming majority of consumers agree that the Puma Classic Nylon R13 is a comfortable pair
Some long-time fans confessed that they have been loyal to this sneaker for years
The shoe is a classic design with an old school style, which most sneaker fans love
Most shoe users find this pair to be true to size
A good number of wearers were delighted that they have been wearing this kick for a year to 2 years and the shoe is still holding up very well
The Puma Classic Nylon R13 is available in various colorways
The pair looks better in person, according to some online buyers
A handful of purchasers said that this kick's material and construction are of excellent quality
One shoe user was happy that it is easy to clean
It is lightweight, based on a few reviewers' opinions
Some shoe users shared that they use this kick for either running, walking, or going to the gym
Majority of the buyers mentioned that the Puma Classic Nylon R13 is a good shoe available at a very good price
cons: Several wearers noticed that the shoe feels narrower than their usual size
A handful of shoe users disclosed that the shoe does not breathe well, but would be an excellent shoe for colder weather

customer_reviews.title: Fits fine, comfortable for a little while
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's just my feet, but I can't stand/walk in these for more than a couple hours (think theme park) without my heels hurting. I'm going to have to return them, but they look awesome so it makes me sad. They're pretty comfortable when you first put them on, too, but for me that was deceiving. With all the other great reviews, I think I might be the odd man out, but YMMV.
